articles.description: JJ Redick criticized the Pelicans' front office for the way it handled his trade to the Mavericks, saying that New Orleans executive David Griffin "did not honor his word" to help put Redick in a favorable situation where he would be closer to his family.
articles.content: JJ Redick criticized the New Orleans Pelicans' front office for the way it handled his trade to the Dallas Mavericks at last week's NBA trade deadline, saying executive vice president of basketball o… [+5290 chars]
